title: GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH
content:
0x9C7B59F9// GetVehicleWheelWidth
float GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to obtain data for.Returns: Float representing width of the wheel (usually between 0.1 and 1.5)Returns vehicle's wheels' width (width is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels (returns 0 in case of default wheels).
